text: Hi kids!
Guess who's here
Yes its me bob
Join me for learning street with bob
“Hello Kids! I am Bob the Train, your DJ & Host.
Welcome to our Phonics show..
“Our participants in this show are the letters of the alphabet.
Isn’t that cool? They will sing, dance and teach us sounds that start with the letters.
Now, let’s say a big hello and welcome to our wonderful judges”
Are you ready, judges?
Yes Bob!
So put your hands together for the most jolly of them all, Mr. J!!
Hey what’s this? Has Mr. J sent us a present?
Shall we open it?
I wish you all a good day Hello! Its me Mr. Ja Ja…J
So Ja Ja Jovial and gay.
The Ja ja jack in the box, I must say, really rocks.
Let’s get started, I say What begins with Ja ja J?
How about some ja ja ja Jelly that ja ja jiggles like a belly
When I do my ja ja ja jigsaw puzzle, You know what I like to guzzle?
Some orange ja ja ja ja juice for that a ja ja ja jug I use
On a picnic in a ja ja ja ja jeep with a horn that goes beep beep beep
Ja ja ja ja some Jam with toast is what I like to eat the most.
Hey what is in that Ja ja ja Jar Don’t let it run too far.
To keep cookies or candy, A jar is really handy.
A circus I went to Had a bear called Boo.
Also a Ja ja ja joker, Who could play soccer.
To a circus I too went and peeped inside a tent.
A ja ja ja juggler I saw juggling without a flaw
I also saw a Ja ja ja Jackal that could really really cackle
And a Ja ja ja jaguar driving fast in a little car.
Mr. Ja ja ja J, has made our day.
Ja ja ja ja ja ja judges, what do you have to say.
Jolly!
Joyfull
Jovial!
Jumboastic!
Thankyou Mr.J and you Awesome Judges.
We will be back soon with the sweet sound of other letters of the alphabet.
Till then Adios !
Hey kids!
Watch the video again and count the number of words
That start with the letter of the alphabet in this episode
Don't forget to put your answers in the comment section below
Thank You!
